Perplex pulled his newly issued blaster rifle, and Zeni backed away from Pe=
rplex.

Perplex: Who are you?

Giant spider: I am the Sarge. Nothing more, =
nothing less.

Sarge saw that he scared Trinity and he transformed to robot=
 mode.

Sarge: Have you seen someone by the name of Deemos? I believe he ca=
me to this planet. I need to execute him.

Perplex: Yeah, he came around he=
re. He's been causing a deal of damage to us and our base.

Sarge: He has, =
huh? Just like him to have an army though, so I know he's not alone! I am c=
orrect, right?

Perplex: Yeah, he had too many with him to count. Some of o=
ur soldiers defected and joined him.

Sarge: Some great war hero he is. He'=
s nothing more than a.....Benedict Arnold.

Perplex put the blaster rifle i=
nto subspace.

Perplex: Shall you be on your way?

Sarge: No, I shall not. =
In fact, I'm staying right here at your base.

Perplex: Huh?

Sarge: Deemos=
 never attacks once. He'll always come back again and again until he destro=
ys everything. I estimate that he's already attacked you twice. He always t=
akes a breather after 2 attacks. He is taking a breather, right?

Perplex: =
Yes, he is.

Sarge: Of course. I'm going to be waiting for him here. When h=
e returns, we need to take him out. Is that clear?

Perplex: I suppose.

Sa=
rge: You suppose? That is no answer, mister.

Sarge looked at Trinity.

Sar=
ge: Sorry I scared you, little girl. But I think Deemos is far scarier than=
 me...
